channel.title: Considering building a new rig
channel.description: So, my insurance money came in today, and I'm really annoyed by how slowly Skyrim runs on my laptop, so I was considering building a desktop for this place which can run it adequately. What would you suggest getting, so I can play it on extreme settings without any lag?

item.title: Considering building a new rig
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

well it really does depend on your budget but i’d recommend an i5 2500k you wont really need anything better and it offers amazing performance for price, a p67 mobo and you can get about 8gb g-skill ram pretty cheap as for gfx cards and the rest i’m afraid i cant be much help there.

Read full topic

item.title: Considering building a new rig
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Tom's Hardware

>$1000 Skyrim Rig (First time builder) - [Solved] - Systems

Hello all,I am looking for some general advice (or any advice) on building a new rig for the first time. I have done some research myself but there's a lot of info out there and even more products. I...

this might be useful.

what is your budget and could maybe help more?

Read full topic
